project.name: travel-agency
project.description: Project of Travel Agency application. Technologies are used: Spring, JPA, Postgres, Jenkins, JUnit and Mokito. Current technology stack: • Build tool: Maven (multi-module project). • Servlet container: Apache Tomcat (use tomcat-maven-plugin for deploy/redeploy features). • Front-end library and styles: EPAM UUI (https://uui.epam.com/). • Web framework: Spring MVC (version 4.x). • Security framework: Spring Security (version 4.x). • Template Engine: Apache FreeMarker.
